channel.title: [PI] Ambitionz forever ( pvp disabled? :D) help!
channel.description:
lol :D in first time i thought pvp is disabled but then i saw this error in server this error come then i click on player attACK WITH MELEE OR RANGE WEAPONS outocasting and spell casting on player work! also all special attack on player work to then wtf is this... [code][1/7/02 6:40 AM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.getWepAnim(Comba tAssistant.java:155) [1/7/02 6:40 AM]: at server.model.players.combat.AttackPlayer.attackPlayer (AttackPlayer.java:682) [1/7/02 6:40 AM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.attackPlayer(Com batAssistant.java:95) [1/7/02 6:40 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:682) [1/7/02 6:40 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:136) [1/7/02 6:40 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:143) [1/7/02 6:40 AM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [1/7/02 6:40 AM]: at server.model.players.combat.melee.MeleeData.getWepAni m(MeleeData.java:169) [1/7/02 6:40 AM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.getWepAnim(Comba tAssistant.java:155) [1/7/02 6:40 AM]: at server.model.players.combat.AttackPlayer.attackPlayer (AttackPlayer.java:682) [1/7/02 6:40 AM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.attackPlayer(Com batAssistant.java:95) [1/7/02 6:40 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:682) [1/7/02 6:40 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:136) [1/7/02 6:40 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:143)[/code]
IDK if anyonecan help. i can post AttackPlayer.java codes etc.... need to fix this cuz that server got perfect pvn and skilling.....
